languages.text: {n}Приблизившись к изуродованному человеку, друкари прикрывает глаза и делает глубокий вдох. Уголки губ изгибаются в пресыщенной улыбке.{/n}
{n}Marazhai approaches the mutilated man, closes his eyes, and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satisfied smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Приблизившись к изуродованному человеку, друкари прикрывает глаза и делает глубокий вдох. Уголки губ изгибаются в пресыщенной улыбке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As he approaches the mutilated man, the Drukhari closes his eyes and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satiated smile.{/n}

{n}Marazhai approaches the mutilated man, closes his eyes, and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satisfied smile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se acerca al hombre mutilado, cierra los ojos y respira hondo. Sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa satisfecha.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai approaches the mutilated man, closes his eyes, and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satisfied smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se acerca al hombre mutilado, cierra los ojos y respira hondo. Sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa satisfecha.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは切り刻まれた男に近づき、目を閉じて深呼吸をした。そして、口角を上げ満足げな笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai approaches the mutilated man, closes his eyes, and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satisfied smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは切り刻まれた男に近づき、目を閉じて深呼吸をした。そして、口角を上げ満足げな笑みを浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋靠近那个被烧得不成样子的人，闭上双眼，深吸了一口气，嘴角露出了满意的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai approaches the mutilated man, closes his eyes, and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satisfied smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋靠近那个被烧得不成样子的人，闭上双眼，深吸了一口气，嘴角露出了满意的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai nähert sich dem verstümmelten Mann, schließt die Augen und atmet tief ein. Seine Mundwinkel verziehen sich zu einem zufriedenen Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai approaches the mutilated man, closes his eyes, and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satisfied smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai nähert sich dem verstümmelten Mann, schließt die Augen und atmet tief ein. Seine Mundwinkel verziehen sich zu einem zufriedenen Lächeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'approche de l'homme mutilé, ferme les yeux et inspire profondément. Les commissures de ses lèvres se retroussent en un sourire satisfait.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai approaches the mutilated man, closes his eyes, and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satisfied smile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yaralı adama yaklaşıp gözlerini kapatıyor ve derin bir nefes alıyor. Dudaklarının ucuyla, memnuniyetini yansıtan bir tebessüm meydana getiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai approaches the mutilated man, closes his eyes, and takes a deep breath. The corners of his lips curve into a satisfied smile.{/n}
